required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: B003 in Patients With HER2-positive Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Trial on the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics of B003 in the Treatment of HER2-positive Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the safety and tolerability characteristics of B003 in HER2-positive patients with recurrent or metastatic breast cancer. The dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) is assessed and the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) is explored.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study is divided into the dose escalation group and the dose expansion group. Dose escalation stage: treatment cycle is administered every 21days,the infusion is taken at the first day of each treatment cycle.Observation period of DLT is from day 1 to day 21 of the first treatment cycle. Dose expansion stage: treatment cycle is administered every 21days and could be administered continuously until the disease progresses or is intolerable.DLT is not accessed during this stage. Blind method: open Test range: Domestic test

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 years
primary_outcome.description: The maximum tolerated dose (MTD) is operationally defined in toxicology as the highest daily dose of a chemical that does not cause overt toxicity in subjects

primary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 to day 21 of treatment
primary_outcome.description: Some of the major toxic side effects are the main reasons limiting the continued increase in the dose of chemotherapy drugs, which are the dose-limiting toxicity of chemotherapy drugs.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 years
primary_outcome.description: Sample positive rate and Individual positive rate of Anti-drug antibody(ADA)

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 years
primary_outcome.description: a test to determine the level or degree of ADA positive samples and analyse the effect on the plasma concentration.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. Peak Plasma Time (Tmax)

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax)

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. half-life time

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. Mean Residence Time( MRT)

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. elimination rate constant

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: According to the detection of the serum concentration of B003 in plasma sample, the diagram of drug concentration-time for individual and each dose group could be concluded. clearance rate(CL/F)

primary_outcome.time_frame: from date of start from the infusion of the first subject until the date after two treatments of the last subject, assessed up to 14 months.
primary_outcome.description: Objective Remission Rate (ORR): to be defined as the percentage of patients with complete response or partial response. Patients with CR or PR for the first evaluation will be confirmed after 4weeks. Patients without any evaluations are regarded as none-response.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from date of start from the infusion of the first subject until the date after two treatments of the last subject, assessed up to 14 months.
primary_outcome.description: Disease Control rate(DCR): to be defined as the percentage of patients with complete response, partial response or stable disease.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the date when he patient has CR or PR to the first evaluation until the date when the patient has disease progression or death, assessed up to 14 months.
primary_outcome.description: Duration of response(DOR): to be defined as the duration from the first evaluation time when the patient has CR or PR to the first evaluation time when the patient has disease progression or death.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the date when he patient has CR or PR to the first evaluation until the date when the patient has disease progression or death, assessed up to 14 months.
primary_outcome.description: Progression-free survival:to be defined as the duration from the time of first infusion to the first recording time when the patient has disease progression or death.

arm_group.arm_group_label: recombinant anti-HER2 humanized monoclonal antibody conjugate
arm_group.description: Drug Name : Recombinant anti-HER2 humanized monoclonal antibody conjugate for injection R & D code: B003 Drug Type : Biological Products

intervention.intervention_name: Recombinant anti-HER2 humanized monoclonal antibody conjugate for injection.R&D code: B003.
intervention.description: Usage: Intravenous infusion; Dose escalation stage: doses 0.6, 1.2, 2.4, 3.6, 4.8 mg / kg, 1-6subjects each. Dose expansion stage: 20 subjects are enrolled and take the recommended dose based on the result of dose escalation stage. Infusion timeï¼š90 minutes(90min-106min suggested) for the first time; if no infusion reaction happens, the follow-up time is adjusted to at least30 minutes(30min-40min suggested).Dose escalation stage: treatment cycle is administered every 21days,the infusion is taken at the first day of each treatment cycle.Observation period of DLT is the 21st day of the first treatment cycle.
intervention.arm_group_label: recombinant anti-HER2 humanized monoclonal antibody conjugate

facility.name: West China Hospital of Sichuan University
